system.novice: On successful Test, for every Degree of Success, the Navigator removes 1 level of fatigue for Toughness Bonus Hours, at which point they are returned.
system.adept: Fatigue is removed for 2xTB hours before being returned. However if navigator fails to rest for at least 8 hours before duration expires, suffers a number of Wounds equal to Fatigue Removed by power.
system.master: Test becomes -20 Willpower, but ignores all Fatigue and can go without sleep for 1d5+1 days. However unless Navigator sleeps for 8 hours in meantime, afterwards  fall into a coma for number of days spent awake minus Toughness Bonus (min 1).
